description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的高级将领及政治人物，现任中共中央政治局委员、中央军委副主席，拥有上将军衔。其父为开国上将张宗逊。曾在1979年中越战争及1984年老山战役中指挥作战，战功卓著。
description.en: A senior general and politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. He is currently a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission, holding the rank of General. His father, Zhang Zongxun, was a founding general of the PLA. He commanded troops in the 1979 Sino-Vietnamese War and the 1984 Battle of Laoshan, achieving distinguished military honors.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军开国上将，曾任中国人民解放军总后勤部部长。
description.en: A founding general of the People's Liberation Army (PLA), who served as the head of the PLA General Logistics Department.

description.zh-cn: 张宗逊将军的夫人，张又侠的母亲。
description.en: Wife of General Zhang Zongxun and mother of Zhang Youxia.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任中共中央政治局委员、中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army, former member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，现任中共中央政治局委员、中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army, currently a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任中共中央政治局委员、中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army, former member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任国务委员、国防部部长、中央军委委员。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army, former State Councilor, Minister of National Defense, and member of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任中央军委委员、国务委员、国防部部长、中央军委装备发展部部长。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army, former member of the Central Military Commission, State Councilor, Minister of National Defense, and Minister of the Equipment Development Department of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任国务委员、国防部部长、中央军委委员。
description.en: A senior general of the People's Liberation Army, former State Councilor, Minister of National Defense, and member of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任沈阳军区司令员、南部战区司令员。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, former commander of the Shenyang Military Region and the Southern Theater Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任陆军第十三集团军军长。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, former commander of the 13th Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任陆军第十三集团军军长。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army, former commander of the 13th Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军开国中将，后晋升上将，曾任中央军委副主席。
description.en: A founding lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army, later promoted to general, who served as Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中国人民解放军第二炮兵部队政治委员。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, former political commissar of the PLA Second Artillery Force.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国武装力量的最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The supreme military leading body of the armed forces of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家军事机关，领导全国武装力量。
description.en: The supreme state military authority of the People's Republic of China, which commands the nation's armed forces.

description.zh-cn: 中央军事委员会的职能部门之一，负责全军装备发展工作。
description.en: One of the functional departments of the Central Military Commission, responsible for the equipment development of the entire military.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总装备部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总装备部

description.zh-cn: 原中央军事委员会的四总部之一，负责全军装备工作，2016年改革中被撤销。
description.en: One of the former four general departments of the Central Military Commission, responsible for the military's equipment. It was dissolved during the 2016 military reform.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军七大军区之一，2016年改革中被撤销。
description.en: One of the former seven military regions of the People's Liberation Army, dissolved during the 2016 military reform.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军北京军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北京军区

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军七大军区之一，2016年改革中被撤销。
description.en: One of the former seven military regions of the People's Liberation Army, dissolved during the 2016 military reform.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军第十三集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第十三集团军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军原集团军之一，后改编为第七十七集团军。
description.en: A former group army of the PLA Ground Force, later reorganized into the 77th Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所著名学校。
description.en: A renowned school located in Beijing, China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军军事学院

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军军事学院

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾设立的最高军事学府，后并入中国人民解放军国防大学。
description.en: The former highest military academy of the People's Liberation Army, later merged into the PLA National Defence University.

description.zh-cn: 1979年中国与越南之间爆发的边境战争。
description.en: A border war fought between China and Vietnam in 1979.

description.zh-cn: 中越边境冲突期间，在云南老山地区发生的一系列战斗。
description.en: A series of battles that took place in the Laoshan area of Yunnan during the Sino-Vietnamese border conflicts.

description.zh-cn: 越南社会主义共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构之一。
description.en: One of the central leading bodies of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总后勤部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总后勤部

description.zh-cn: 原中央军事委员会的四总部之一，负责军队后勤保障工作，2016年改革中被撤销。
description.en: One of the former four general departments of the Central Military Commission, responsible for the military's logistics support. It was dissolved during the 2016 military reform.

description.zh-cn: 在在景山学校完成小学、初中与高中学业。
description.en: Completed primary, junior high, and senior high school education at Beijing Jingshan School.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军军事学院

description.zh-cn: 在基本系进修并获得大专学位。
description.en: Studied in the basic department and obtained an associate degree.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央军事委员会
中华人民共和国中央军事委员会
中国共产党中央政治局
中国人民解放军总装备部
中国人民解放军沈阳军区
中国人民解放军北京军区
中国人民解放军陆军第十三集团军

position.zh-cn: 中央军事委员会副主席
position.en: Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 在习近平担任中共中央军委主席期间，张又侠任中央军委副主席。
description.en: During Xi Jinping's tenure as Chairman of the CCP Central Military Commission, Zhang Youxia served as Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 与许其亮一同担任中共中央军事委员会副主席和中华人民共和国中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: Served alongside Xu Qiliang as Vice Chairman of the CCP Central Military Commission and the PRC Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 与何卫东一同担任中共中央军事委员会副主席和中华人民共和国中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: Has been serving alongside He Weidong as Vice Chairman of the CCP Central Military Commission and the PRC Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 张又侠接替范长龙出任中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: Zhang Youxia succeeded Fan Changlong as Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 张又侠接替常万全出任中国人民解放军总装备部部长。
description.en: Zhang Youxia succeeded Chang Wanquan as Minister of the PLA General Armament Department.

description.zh-cn: 张又侠卸任中央军委装备发展部部长后，该职务由李尚福接任。
description.en: After Zhang Youxia stepped down as Minister of the Equipment Development Department of the CMC, he was succeeded by Li Shangfu.

description.zh-cn: 2012年，时任沈阳军区司令员的张又侠陪同国防部长梁光烈访问美国。
description.en: In 2012, Zhang Youxia, then Commander of the Shenyang Military Region, accompanied Minister of National Defense Liang Guanglie on a visit to the United States.

description.zh-cn: 作为连长参加1979年中越战争，并因表现出色获得晋升。
description.en: Participated in the 1979 Sino-Vietnamese War as a company commander and was promoted for his outstanding performance.

description.zh-cn: 在老山战役中担任一一九团团长，指挥部队攻占关键高地，为战役取得决定性胜利立下首功。
description.en: Served as the commander of the 119th Regiment during the Battle of Laoshan, leading his troops to capture key high grounds and playing a primary role in the decisive victory of the battle.

description.zh-cn: 在1979年中越战争和1984年老山战役中，张又侠指挥部队与越南人民军作战。
description.en: In the 1979 Sino-Vietnamese War and the 1984 Battle of Laoshan, Zhang Youxia commanded troops in combat against the People's Army of Vietnam.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总后勤部
